# Powerline Glyphs Test Fixture
# Private Use Area characters U+E0A0-U+E0D7
# Used by: oh-my-zsh, Powerlevel10k, Starship, airline, powerline
# Use: Feed to terminal, verify non-empty vertex output for each

# Core Powerline symbols (U+E0A0-U+E0A3)
 U+E0A0 POWERLINE BRANCH (git branch icon)
 U+E0A1 POWERLINE LINE NUMBER
 U+E0A2 POWERLINE LOCK (read-only/locked indicator)
 U+E0A3 POWERLINE COLUMN NUMBER

# Arrow separators (U+E0B0-U+E0B3) - MOST COMMONLY USED
 U+E0B0 POWERLINE RIGHT ARROW SOLID (right-pointing filled triangle)
 U+E0B1 POWERLINE RIGHT ARROW OUTLINE (right-pointing hollow triangle)
 U+E0B2 POWERLINE LEFT ARROW SOLID (left-pointing filled triangle)
 U+E0B3 POWERLINE LEFT ARROW OUTLINE (left-pointing hollow triangle)

# Rounded/soft separators (U+E0B4-U+E0B7)
 U+E0B4 POWERLINE RIGHT SEMICIRCLE
 U+E0B5 POWERLINE RIGHT SEMICIRCLE OUTLINE
 U+E0B6 POWERLINE LEFT SEMICIRCLE
 U+E0B7 POWERLINE LEFT SEMICIRCLE OUTLINE

# Triangle separators (U+E0B8-U+E0BF)
 U+E0B8 POWERLINE LOWER LEFT TRIANGLE
 U+E0B9 POWERLINE BACKSLASH SEPARATOR
 U+E0BA POWERLINE LOWER RIGHT TRIANGLE
 U+E0BB POWERLINE FORWARDSLASH SEPARATOR
 U+E0BC POWERLINE UPPER LEFT TRIANGLE
 U+E0BD POWERLINE FORWARDSLASH SEPARATOR ALT
 U+E0BE POWERLINE UPPER RIGHT TRIANGLE
 U+E0BF POWERLINE BACKSLASH SEPARATOR ALT

# Flame separators (U+E0C0-U+E0C7)
 U+E0C0 POWERLINE FLAME RIGHT
 U+E0C1 POWERLINE FLAME RIGHT OUTLINE
 U+E0C2 POWERLINE FLAME LEFT
 U+E0C3 POWERLINE FLAME LEFT OUTLINE
 U+E0C4 POWERLINE PIXELATED RIGHT SOLID
 U+E0C5 POWERLINE PIXELATED RIGHT OUTLINE
 U+E0C6 POWERLINE PIXELATED LEFT SOLID
 U+E0C7 POWERLINE PIXELATED LEFT OUTLINE

# Ice/pixel separators (U+E0C8-U+E0CF)
 U+E0C8 POWERLINE ICE WAVEFORM RIGHT
 U+E0CA POWERLINE ICE WAVEFORM LEFT
 U+E0CC POWERLINE HONEYCOMB RIGHT
 U+E0CD POWERLINE HONEYCOMB RIGHT OUTLINE
 U+E0CE POWERLINE HONEYCOMB LEFT
 U+E0CF POWERLINE HONEYCOMB LEFT OUTLINE

# Misc separators (U+E0D0-U+E0D7)
 U+E0D0 POWERLINE TRAPEZOID RIGHT
 U+E0D1 POWERLINE TRAPEZOID RIGHT OUTLINE
 U+E0D2 POWERLINE TRAPEZOID LEFT
 U+E0D4 POWERLINE ARROW RIGHT THIN

# ============================================================
# Visual test patterns - Common prompt configurations
# ============================================================

# Basic Powerline prompt (arrow separators)
 user@host  ~/project  main

# Powerlevel10k style (with semicircles)
 user@host  ~/project  main

# Rounded style
 user  ~/project   main

# With triangular separators
user ~/project  main

# Common status line patterns
 INSERT   file.txt  utf-8  ln:42 col:10

# git status with branch indicator
  main  +2 ~1 -0

# Full powerline prompt simulation
 user  host  ~  project   main  12:34
